org.apache.flink.runtime.jobgraph

类 JobVertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.jobgraph.JobVertex
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable
    直接已知子类:
    InputFormatVertex, OutputFormatVertex

    public class JobVertex
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The base class for job vertexes.
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private CoLocationGroup coLocationGroup
      The group inside which the vertex subtasks share slots
      private Configuration configuration
      Custom configuration passed to the assigned task at runtime.
      private static java.lang.String DEFAULT_NAME 
      private JobVertexID id
      The ID of the vertex.
      private java.util.ArrayList<JobVertexID> idAlternatives
      The alternative IDs of the vertex.
      private java.util.ArrayList<JobEdge> inputs
      List of edges with incoming data.
      private InputSplitSource<?> inputSplitSource
      Optionally, a source of input splits
      private java.lang.String invokableClassName
      The class of the invokable.
      private boolean isStoppable
      Indicates of this job vertex is stoppable or not.
      private int maxParallelism
      Maximum number of subtasks to split this taks into a runtime.
      private ResourceSpec minResources
      The minimum resource of the vertex
      private java.lang.String name
      The name of the vertex.
      private java.lang.String operatorDescription
      Optional, the description of the operator, like 'Hash Join', or 'Sorted Group Reduce', to be included in the JSON plan
      private java.util.ArrayList<OperatorID> operatorIDs
      The IDs of all operators contained in this vertex.
      private java.util.ArrayList<OperatorID> operatorIdsAlternatives
      The alternative IDs of all operators contained in this vertex.
      private java.lang.String operatorName
      Optional, the name of the operator, such as 'Flat Map' or 'Join', to be included in the JSON plan
      private java.lang.String operatorPrettyName
      Optional, pretty name of the operator, to be displayed in the JSON plan
      private int parallelism
      Number of subtasks to split this task into at runtime.
      private ResourceSpec preferredResources
      The preferred resource of the vertex
      private java.lang.String resultOptimizerProperties
      Optional, the JSON for the optimizer properties of the operator result, to be included in the JSON plan
      private java.util.ArrayList<IntermediateDataSet> results
      List of produced data sets, one per writer
      private static long serialVersionUID 
      private SlotSharingGroup slotSharingGroup
      Optionally, a sharing group that allows subtasks from different job vertices to run concurrently in one slot

        private java.lang.String name

        Optional, the name of the operator, such as 'Flat Map' or 'Join', to be included in the JSON plan

        private java.lang.String operatorDescription
        Optional, the description of the operator, like 'Hash Join', or 'Sorted Group Reduce', to be included in the JSON plan

        private java.lang.String operatorPrettyName
        Optional, pretty name of the operator, to be displayed in the JSON plan

      • resultOptimizerProperties

        private java.lang.String resultOptimizerProperties
        Optional, the JSON for the optimizer properties of the operator result, to be included in the JSON plan

      • setSlotSharingGroup

        public void setSlotSharingGroup(SlotSharingGroup grp)
        Associates this vertex with a slot sharing group for scheduling. Different vertices in the same slot sharing group can run one subtask each in the same slot.
        参数:
        grp - The slot sharing group to associate the vertex with.

      • getSlotSharingGroup

        public SlotSharingGroup getSlotSharingGroup()
        Gets the slot sharing group that this vertex is associated with. Different vertices in the same slot sharing group can run one subtask each in the same slot. If the vertex is not associated with a slot sharing group, this method returns null.
        返回:
        The slot sharing group to associate the vertex with, or null, if not associated with one.

      • setStrictlyCoLocatedWith

        public void setStrictlyCoLocatedWith(JobVertex strictlyCoLocatedWith)
        Tells this vertex to strictly co locate its subtasks with the subtasks of the given vertex. Strict co-location implies that the n'th subtask of this vertex will run on the same parallel computing instance (TaskManager) as the n'th subtask of the given vertex. NOTE: Co-location is only possible between vertices in a slot sharing group. NOTE: This vertex must (transitively) depend on the vertex to be co-located with. That means that the respective vertex must be a (transitive) input of this vertex.
        参数:
        strictlyCoLocatedWith - The vertex whose subtasks to co-locate this vertex's subtasks with.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown, if this vertex and the vertex to co-locate with are not in a common slot sharing group.
        另请参阅:
        setSlotSharingGroup(SlotSharingGroup)

        public CoLocationGroup getCoLocationGroup()

      • initializeOnMaster

        public void initializeOnMaster(java.lang.ClassLoader loader)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        A hook that can be overwritten by sub classes to implement logic that is called by the master when the job starts.
        参数:
        loader - The class loader for user defined code.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - The method may throw exceptions which cause the job to fail immediately.
